reviewText: I thought the story line promised much but it was not to be.  Stalham was the only actor to put some life into his character. The other two were forgettable. A closer examination (if you buy a copy) will in my opinion reveal a low budget attempt. Some of country side scenes gave some redemption.

This is a review of the In The Name Of The King Collection Blu-Ray. This is not a review of the films. If you're actively seeking out Uwe Boll films on Amazon you know exactly who he is and what he does and you know what you're getting yourself into. This is just to inform you of the details I wish I could have known before I blindly purchased it hoping the Amazon product description was misleading. The Amazon product description is misleading. This product contains 3 blu ray discs, one for each film. As far as I can tell they are the same discs as the standalone versions. They contain all the special features of the standalone versions, including Uwe Bolls commentary tracks, and the first film is the unrated directors cut version.

Terrible rendition(s) of the computer role playing game with the same name. The game itself was loads of fun to play and would make another target for low talent director (Uwe Boll) of this, and numerous other, junk movies!
While the first movie with Statham is watchable, 2 and 3 will just suck time out of your life.
I believe a purchase is just a waste of money but hey, who am I but "another" reviewer.
This movie was not as good as I was hoping for.
It's a very great movie collection
Don't do it, don't try, don't be lured by the cast. This is a terrible movie. It's not even campy enough to be good on that merit. Stupid plot, stupid direction, terrible editing. Really awful movie.
Great for a bad movie night. All three movies are bad for different reasons. Lots of fun just to watch and see how bad they are.
already had one and two and decided to get it just for three. still a good bargain.
Fantastic trio of movies great action
Product works as it is supposed to, was at an excellent price, and fast shipping.  Another perfect online transaction.
Jason Statham, Dolph, and Gerard Butler. great script and well put together. PLENTY of action that will keep your attention. great to add to my d v d library, re-watchable.
I got what I paid for
